title: Bump to v1.4.0

Bump to v1.4.0

* Doze Notification blacklist feature
* Doze App blacklist feature
* Debug logs accessible on unrooted devices
* Privacy policy
* Lots of other fixes and changes

title: Support for Doze Tunables
message:
Support for Doze Tunables

* Added support for Doze Tunables: You can now modify Doze parameters
directly (requires root at the moment, but you can copy the ADB command
to manually apply the changes)

title: Bug fixes
message:
Bug fixes

* Fixed: Crash when clicking on Donate option.
* Fixed: ForceDoze not adding itself to Doze whitelist on Nougat. Now,
it will show you a notification that will take you to the battery
optimisation settings to manually add ForceDoze, as it's not possible to
add it automatically by ForceDoze on Nougat.
* Fixed: ForceDoze calling deviceidle to add itself to whitelist,
causing an exception because DEVICE_POWER permission wasn't granted. The
permission cannot be granted to apps like ForceDoze, hence a workaround
has been implemented as described above.

title: Updates to Doze battery stats, etc
message:
Updates to Doze battery stats, etc

New:

* Option to sign up for ForceDoze Beta testing. Go to Menu - Settings -
About ForceDoze and tap on 'Sign up for beta testing'
* Ability to open the Battery optimization system activity from
Whitelist

Changed:

* Improvements to Doze Battery stats. New UI and more stats!
* Doze Battery stats now only stores the most recent 100 entries (50
sessions) to reduce clutter

title: Reverted some changes
message:
Reverted some changes

Changed:

REVERTED previous changes made to ForceDozeService regarding sensor
enable/disable. Your previous configuration will automatically be
restored. The changes made led to some users experience battery drain,
so I have now reverted the changes and made it optional, just like it
was before

title: Updates to ForceDozeService, Whitelist, Doze stats, etc
message:
Updates to ForceDozeService, Whitelist, Doze stats, etc

New:

* ForceDozeService: Completely removed sensor enabling/disabling
functionality, replaced it with a non-root/non-Xposed workaround to
reliably re-activate Doze on device movement
* Persistent Notification: Replaced "Currently Dozing" stat (which was
useless) with "Battery usage in last Doze session" stat, which will tell
you how much battery was consumed in the last Doze session. I believe
this would be a lot more useful
* Whitelist: Added the ability to add/remove apps by package name

Fixed:

* Whitelist: Whitelist not getting properly updated after
adding/removing apps
* Doze Battery stats: Shows date/time in 24-hour format by default,
should fix the issue where stats would show am/pm and also mess up the
sorting. Your old logs won't be accessible due to this change
* Doze Battery stats: Fixed logs not getting cleared for some users

title: New Tasker broadcast, Tasker broadcast list activity, etc
message:
New Tasker broadcast, Tasker broadcast list activity, etc

New:

* Experimental option to prevent Doze from exiting on movement
(root/Xposed not required)
* New broadcast (com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.CHANGE_SETTING) to allow you
to change ForceDoze settings via Tasker
* Added the ability to see all supported Tasker-compatible broadcasts
and the values you need to pass (if applicable). To see, go to Settings
> Tasker broadcasts

Changed:

* Updates to ForceDozeService
* Updates to Xposed module
* Option to turn off mobile data during Doze is no longer available if
you're not rooted

title: Updates to translation, ForceDoze service, etc
message:
Updates to translation, ForceDoze service, etc

New:

* Portuguese (Brazil) Translation (GamerVicioX)
* Disable WiFi and mobile data during Doze (it will be re-enabled during
a Doze maintenance window, or when you turn on the screen). State will
be maintained, so if you never had WiFi or mobile data enabled before
the device entered Doze, then it won't be re-enabled

Changed:

* Brought back 'Clear stats' option into Doze battery stats UI

Fixed:

* Lockscreen timeout added to Doze Delay even when 'Ignore lockscreen
timeout' is enabled

title: Updates to whitelisting, translation, etc
message:
Updates to whitelisting, translation, etc

New:

* Spanish Translation (thanks to monza1412 from XDA)

Changed:

* Whitelist UI now loads packages directly from Doze whitelist
* ForceDoze will exit Doze mode if you plug your charger while the
device is in Doze mode and 'Disable when charging' is enabled in
Settings. Previously, it only prevented the device from entering Doze if
the charger was connected before the screen turned off (and entered
Doze)

title: Improvements to UI/UX, moved strings to strings.xml, etc
message:
Improvements to UI/UX, moved strings to strings.xml, etc

New:

* Improvements to UI/UX (About Page, Confirmation Dialog when turning on
ForceDoze, etc)
* One-time donate dialog prompting the user to donate in order to
support dev

Changed:

* Moved all strings to strings.xml for easy translation
* Restrict sensorservice to AutomaticBrightnessController to possibly
fix auto-brightness issues without needing to toggle auto-brightness

title: Improvements, fixes, etc
message: Improvements, fixes, etc

title: Updates to Xposed module and ForceDoze service
message:
Updates to Xposed module and ForceDoze service

New:

* Option to disable motion sensing for Doze, without disabling device
motion sensors. This feature is EXPERIMENTAL and requires Xposed. Please
let me know if this option works as intended or not

* Changed:

* ForceDoze now ignores lockscreen timeout value by default, so a wake
lock is no longer required. If this has unwanted effects, please
disable 'Ignore lockscreen timeout' in Settings. PS: You might have to
manually turn it on if you're updating the app and this isn't the first
install

title: Xposed Module updates, etc
message: Xposed Module updates, etc

title: Crash fix
message:
Crash fix

Fixed:

* Crash when opening Whitelist activity

title: Fixes, Cleanup & Improvements
message: Fixes, Cleanup & Improvements

title: Xposed module to permanently enable Doze, etc
message:
Xposed module to permanently enable Doze, etc

New:

* Xposed module to permanently enable Doze on unsupported device, so you
don't have to enable Doze every time after device restart
* 'Ignore Lockscreen timeout' option to put the device into Doze mode
regardless of the Lockscreen timeout value. This is EXPERIMENTAL, so
beware

Changed:

* Lockscreen timeout warning is now enforced if the lockscreen timeout
is anything other than 'Immediately'. If you don't want the app to use
wakelock, please change the Lockscreen timeout to 'Immediately'

title: Improvements to service, warnings, etc
message:
Improvements to service, warnings, etc

New:

* A partial wakelock is acquired when the screen turns off to make sure
the timers responsible for delaying Doze are correctly fired. This
should fix issues on some devices where Doze mode isn't activated on
screen off. The wakelock is automatically released after the timers
fire. To make sure the wakelock has minimal impact on battery life,
ensure neither Doze Delay nor Lockscreen timeout has a high value (>15
min)

* Doze Delay now shows a warning dialog if the delay is set to more than
15 mins to notify the user that having a high delay value can possibly
have a negative effect on battery life

Changed:

* Doze battery stats are now sorted from recent to oldest

title: Fix typo
message: Fix typo

title: Fix for android.permission.DEVICE_POWER not granted on N Preview
message:
Fix for android.permission.DEVICE_POWER not granted on N Preview

New:

* android.permission.DEVICE_POWER is now required to change Doze state
on Android N Preview devices. This will be done automatically if you're
rooted, if you're not, then you will have to grant it manually via ADB,
just like you granted the DUMP permission

title: Remove persistent notification icon from status bar, some fixes, etc
message:
Remove persistent notification icon from status bar, some fixes, etc

Changed:

* Persistent notification icon is hidden from status bar
* Moved the 'Clear stats' option from Doze battery stats to Settings
* There is now a delay of 1 second if lockscreen timeout is set to
'Immediately', to fix some rare cases of Doze not activating

Fixed:

* Crash when opening Doze battery stats
* A few bugs

title: Fix crashes
message: Fix crashes

title: Adjustments for N Preview, Persistent Doze Stats Notification, etc
message:
Adjustments for N Preview, Persistent Doze Stats Notification, etc

New:

* Android N Preview Support - ForceDoze now correctly works on N Preview
* Persistent Notification - Persistent Notification to show Doze stats
(Is currently Dozing, Last Screen Off, and Time spent dozing)

Changed:

* Removed sensorservice whitelist because most apps don't support it

Fixed:

* "Checking for SU" progress dialog can be dismissed on touching outside
of the dialog
* Some bugs

title: New broadcast intents for Tasker, UI bugfix, etc
message:
New broadcast intents for Tasker, UI bugfix, etc

New:

* New Broadcast intents: ADD_WHITELIST and REMOVE_WHITELIST to add or
remove apps from Doze whitelist via Intent. Details in Play Store
description

Fixed:

* ForceDoze status text not updating when toggling the switch on/off

title: Improvements to UI & service, and some bugfixes
message:
Improvements to UI & service, and some bugfixes

Changed:

* UI improvements
* Settings, Debug log and Doze stats no longer gets incorrectly disabled

Fixed:

* Doze mode incorrectly activating during outgoing calls
* Some other bugs

title: Bugfixes
message:
Bugfixes

Fixed:

* Doze incorrectly turning on when the screen is on. This should
hopefully fix weird issues like Play Store complaining about background
data and clock not getting updated

title: UI overhaul, clear button in Doze stats, etc
message:
UI overhaul, clear button in Doze stats, etc

New:

* UI overhaul
* Added a clear button in Doze battery stats
* More info button on main UI that shows more information about how Doze
and ForceDoze works

Changed:

* Improvements to whitelisting
* Whitelist activity now shows a dialog box (one-time only) with more
info about Whitelisting
* Normalized icon sizes
* Donate button now uses Chrome Custom Tabs to show the donation page

title: Improved whitelisting, Improved service, etc
message:
Improved whitelisting, Improved service, etc

Changed:

* Whitelisting apps is now much easier, you can now select an app from a
list of installed apps instead of manually typing the package name
* There is no need to restart the ForceDoze service after changing a
setting, the service reloads the settings automatically

title: Doze delay option, Tasker support, etc
message:
Doze delay option, Tasker support, etc

New:

* Doze Delay - Now you can add a delay before Doze mode activates after
screen off
* Tasker Support - You can now send
"com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.DISABLE_FORCEDOZE" broadcast intent to
disable the ForceDoze service, or
"com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.ENABLE_FORCEDOZE" to enable the ForceDoze
service

Changed:

* Improvements to ForceDoze service so it works more reliably

Fixed:

* Motion sensors (like proximity) get disabled while on-call
* Doze battery stats doesn't display data correctly

title: Add global project files
message: Add global project files

title: Root mode improvements, AutoRestart on update, cleanup, etc
message:
Root mode improvements, AutoRestart on update, cleanup, etc

Changed:

* Improvements to root-mode performance
* ForceDoze service now automatically restarts when the app gets updated
via Play Store

title: Fix for auto-rotate/brightness bug, debug log viewer, etc
message:
Fix for auto-rotate/brightness bug, debug log viewer, etc

New:

* Auto Rotate and Adaptive Brightness fix for those who are experiencing
auto-rotate and auto-brightness not working after turning on the screen.
Turn on 'Auto-rotate/brightness fix' in app settings (Menu > Settings)
and restart ForceDoze service to apply

* View Debug logs (requires root): View app and full logcat and share it

Changed:

* Improvements to non-root mode
* Improvements to debug logging
* Improvements to UI feedback

Fixed:

* Crash when removing an item from whitelist

title: Bugfixes, refactoring, cleanup, etc
message:
Bugfixes, refactoring, cleanup, etc

New:

* Changelog dialog added
* Version number added to the bottom of main UI

Changed:

* Main UI and other items looks much nicer now
* Moved whitelist apps to Settings
* 'Enable Doze on unsupported device' option only shows up if Doze is
actually disabled by the OEM on your device

Fixed:

* Battery percentage shows as empty on some devices
* Doze usage stats are not chronological

title: Update README.md
message: Update README.md

title: Bug fixes
message:
Bug fixes

Fixes a bug where the service started on boot completed, even when the
user hasn't enabled the service

title: Remove a bunch of useless files
message: Remove a bunch of useless files

title: Optionally keep sensors enabled on Doze, Doze usage stats, etc
message:
Optionally keep sensors enabled on Doze, Doze usage stats, etc

New:

* You can now let motion sensors stay active for all apps when Doze mode
is active
* Disable Doze on charging: You can now disable Doze mode when the
device is charging. This is turned on by default
* You can now see at what times the device has entered/exited Doze mode
and the battery percentage at that time

Changed:

* ForceDoze will now ask for confirmation when resetting

Fixed:

* Reset ForceDoze does not disable service
* Sensors not enabling properly after screen on

title: Whitelist app from sensorservice, bug fixes, etc
message:
Whitelist app from sensorservice, bug fixes, etc

New:

* Whitelist app from sensorservice: Disabling motion sensing prevents
all apps from utilizing sensors. You can now whitelist one app (only 1
due to sensorservice restriction) and it will be allowed to access
motion sensors in Doze mode. Go to App menu -> Whitelist apps -> Menu ->
Whitelist apps from sensorservice

* Reset ForceDoze

Changed:

* Language clarity

Fixed:

* Bug: Auto-rotate disabled on some devices
* Bug: Some menu options disabled until app restart
* Some other bugs

title: Whitelist, Force Enable Doze, etc
message:
Whitelist, Force Enable Doze, etc

New:

* Whitelist apps: You can now whitelist specific apps so they do not get
suspended or disabled while Doze is active

* Force Enable Doze: On some devices, Doze mode is disabled by the OEM.
You can now enable it using the Force Enable Doze feature. This feature
is experimental, so YMMV

Changed:

* Disable Doze feature has been removed because it was not important
* Non-root workaround dialog now shows a Share option so you can share
the ADB command to Pushbullet, etc

Fixed:

* Some bugs

message: Added no-root mode
